doc.title: Quest
doc.plot: In this motivational drama, Brian Cane shares to friend Greg his feelings and stories of wanting to become a successful actor in Hollywood. Through a metaphoric, physical and enduring journey it is explained how Brian felt before coming to Los Angele to pursue his dream, and certain events and realizations he had which helped him develop a new outlook. Before getting very deep into the industry, Brian came to respect it more after seeing how much more different and difficult it was than he ever imagined. Brian began to appreciate it more and it helped him to step it up and get to business if he really wanted to succeed.
